website_summaries.verdict: A great combination pack of 2 individual blankets for multiple locations around the home.
pros: Each fire blanket comes in an individual pouch that is easy to remove when necessary
Each one can be used multiple times
cons: Not large enough for a full-size adult

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these recently in order to have them in my kitchen and bedrooms just in case. They are great quality and are very compact making them easy to store. However I was under the assumption that these were meant for adults as a size was not indicated in the description. The warning on the front states that they are not an adequate size for adult clothing fires. Not that I anticipate needing these for that specific reason, but it would have been nice to see that included in the product description. Overall I’m happy with the product and feel safer knowing I have them on hand!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny M

customer_reviews.title: Very compact and doesn't expired
customer_reviews.text: I hung it on the wall by my stove for emergency. It's great that this is compact and doesn't have an expiration date. I will update on the effectiveness if I ever start a fire and needed to use this... Not like I would ever want to use it in my home.
customer_reviews.author: PYNK

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I gave the item five stars because it was just what I expected at a good price. I ordered 2 packs of two (four total) and kept two for our home and will be placing the other two in our rental properties.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Good to have
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t needed to use yet thankfully but good to know we have in the camper Incase we need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it will work. Fire safety you never know when you will need it for you or someone else. Loaded in truck, car and kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Knows

customer_reviews.title: Great asset to any home
customer_reviews.text: Keep these handy on each floor of the house in a central location...hopefully will never need them
customer_reviews.author: lm

customer_reviews.title: Good idea!
customer_reviews.text: I like having these in my pantry for emergencies. Less messy than the extinguisher but I keep one of them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i wanted, hopefully i wont need to ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i wanted , hopefully i wont need to use but once in a apartment fire i take all precautions now !
customer_reviews.author: Dave W.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for fire safety
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should have this in there house. GREAT for fire safety. I have it on my fridg
customer_reviews.author: Terri D.

customer_reviews.title: Haven't had to use it, but glad to have it near by
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had to use it, and hope not to. However, the concept of the product looks good
customer_reviews.author: Lynn C.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I hope I never need them but it’s a comfort to know they’re there
customer_reviews.author: CRB

customer_reviews.title: Great to have just in case
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to put in our emergency kit and also our camping kit for the just in case scenario. Hopefully they work as advertised but there is only one way to really test them and I'd rather not. They seem really sturdy and of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Traci C

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Nice to have a piece of security around!
customer_reviews.author: Susann C

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I believe everyone that has kids should have one of these in the house
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top drawer item.
customer_reviews.text: This item is all you see and more. Extremely high quality and heavy duty. No doubt it could be used in a substantial emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas T

customer_reviews.title: Important to keep handy in case of a fire
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to unfold in a hurry and very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn S Little

customer_reviews.title: Just like Linus, bought these as a security blanket
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised, good security, bought for our church kitchen, hope I never have to submit a review on how they work in a fire
customer_reviews.author: Robert Iadarola

customer_reviews.title: ... a present my son in law said it was perfect just what he wanted and the perfect size
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is since it was a present my son in law said it was perfect just what he wanted and the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As of right now I am giving it 5 starts......hope I never have to use it
customer_reviews.author: Carroll S.

customer_reviews.title: Good to have
customer_reviews.text: I gave one to my daughter and kept one for me. It looks like it’s good quality but hope I never have to use it. Just a comfort to know I could quickly grab it if needed in the kitchen. The size is larger than I expected and comes out of the bag very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Helpful Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great to be prepared for a fire
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit of an emergency preparedness fan. I put one of these blankets in my husband and my bags, just in case. It's comforting to know I'm prepared to protect myself and my husband in a fire emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei Brown

customer_reviews.title: Important purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought just in case! Have many cooks in my kitchen right now so wanted to be safe. Also have smokers who if they dare smoke inside and start a fire, I’m ready?!!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Weck

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I hope we never need to use this. I bought one for us and one for our son. Just in case...
customer_reviews.author: Dave In Trinity

customer_reviews.title: Gives Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those safety products that every household should have. I'm thankful I haven't had to use it but it's simple design and clear instructions are helpful. It's nice that the package comes with 2 as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nicole Warren

customer_reviews.title: Safety in a bag
customer_reviews.text: This sounds like something we need on the boat and in the trailer. It’s always nice to have something you could throw over yourself or the dogs in case of a fire. they come very nicely packaged and look to be very easy to get out of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Link

product_meta.title: FYJENNICC Fire Blanket Emergency Survival Fiberglass Shelter Safety Cover for The Kitchen Fireplace Grill Car Camping 39x39 in (White 2 Pack)
feature_bullets: MATERIAL: 100% Glass Fiber Cloth,flame-retardant cotton tapes
KEEP YOURSELF SAFE: Extinguishes fire by suffocating it; extinguishes both liquid and grease fires
MESS-FREE: Unlike the fire extinguishers, the fire blanket does not leave a mess after a fire
VERSATILE: Ideal for the kitchen, fireplace, grill, car, camping
USEFUL IN SURVIVAL SITUATIONS: Can also be used to cover your body and act as a heat shield
